-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Compiler plugin for loop unrolling
--   
--   This plugin gives an example of defining a compiler plugin for GHC. It
--   unrolls/peels loops loops that are properly annoted. See the included
--   tests for examples.
@package unroll-ghc-plugin
@version 0.1.1

module LoopUnrolling.Annotations
data Peel
Peel :: Int -> Peel
data Unroll
Unroll :: Int -> Unroll
instance Typeable Peel
instance Typeable Unroll
instance Data Peel
instance Data Unroll

module LoopUnrolling.Plugin
plugin :: Plugin
